cards.title: What's-Her-Face
powers: Reveal the top card of the villain deck. Discard it or put it into play. If you put it into play, you may play a [u]recall[/u] card now.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may draw a card.
Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

openingLines.default: don't remember me? that's ok, you still won't even after we beat you.
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: if there's anything people are good at around me, it's letting down their guard.
openingLines.KismetCharacter: that's what you said last time. don't you remember?
openingLines.SpiteCharacter: won't work. nobody gets to know me at all.
openingLines.ErmineTeamCharacter: you'd have to remember my stuff exists first.
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: look lady, that's just a Tuesday for me.
openingLines.PlagueRatTeamCharacter: well. he might not even [b]notice[/b] me.
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: oh, you won't even notice I'm here.

cards.title: Ace Up Her Sleeve
body: When this card enters play, one hero other than {WhatsHerFace} may use a power.
cards.flavorText: “ms. montgomery asked me to{BR}give you this access card.”

cards.title: Anti-Antimemetics
body: Play this card next to a hero character card.
Redirect all Damage that would be dealt to Hero Targets to that hero.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Check Your Target
body: Play this card next to a non-hero target.
Redirect the first damage dealt by that target each turn to the villain target with the highest HP.
If that target leaves play, return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Flourish and Vanish
body: Destroy an ongoing or environment card.
If you destroyed an environment card, {WhatsHerFace} regains 2 hp.
If you destroyed a hero card, you may draw 1 card now.

cards.title: Forgot About Her
body: Play this card next to a non-hero target.
{WhatsHerFace} is immune to damage dealt by that target.
If {WhatsHerFace} deals damage to that target, or If that target leaves play, destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: a river pirate, Fish Out of Water (EC #13)

cards.title: Just What You Needed
body: 1 player selects a keyword.
That player reveals cards from the top of their deck until they reveal 2 cards with that keyword. Put one of them either into play or into their hand.
Shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into their deck.

cards.title: Lost And Forgotten
body: Play this card next to a non-character card.
If that card is destroyed, remove it from the game instead, then remove this card from the game.
If that card leaves play in any other way, return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Missed By That Much
body: Play this card next to a hero ongoing or equipment card.
When that card would be destroyed, prevent that destruction, then destroy this card.
If that card leaves play in any other way, return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Not Quite Sure What This Does?
powers: Play the top card of your deck. If you played a [u]recall[/u] card, play the top card of your deck. If you played an equipment card, move 1 card from your trash to the top of your deck. If you played a one-shot, you may draw 1 card now.
cards.flavorText: “it'll either neutralize the{BR}radiation, or... make it worse.{BR}either way, problem solved?”

cards.title: Pull The Pins
body: Destroy any number of [u]recall[/u] cards. {WhatsHerFace} deals each non-hero target X Fire damage, where X = the number of cards destroyed this way.

cards.title: Subtle Influence
body: Play this card next to a character card.
increase damage dealt to targets in that character's play area by 1.
reduce damage dealt by targets in that character's play area by 1.
At the start of your turn, either discard a card or destroy this card.

cards.title: Thorough Analysis
body: Play this card next to a target.
At the start of your turn, either that target gains 2 HP or {WhatsHerFace} deals that target 2 Psychic damage.
If that target leaves play, return this card to your hand.
cards.flavorText: “why a pawn shop?{BR}what are these demons taking?”

cards.title: Visual Calculus
body: Play this card next to a character card.
You may look at the top card of their deck at any time.
If that target leaves play, return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: follow th' trail then. got it.

cards.title: Watch Your Step
body: One target deals itself 2 Melee damage, plus 2 per [u]recall[/u] card next to it.

cards.title: Where Did She Come From?
body: Play this card next to a target.
At the start of your turn, {WhatsHerFace} deals that target 2 projectile damage.
At the end of your turn, move this card next to a new target.
If the card this card is next to leaves play, destroy this card.

promoCards.title: What's-Her-Face
powers: Destroy a [u]recall[/u] card. If you do, {WhatsHerFace} deals 1 target 3 sonic damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Move an equipment card from a hero trash into play.
Each player may discard a card. Any player that does draws 2 cards.
Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to that target by 1.

openingLines.default: time to see what all these new toys can do.
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: oh, no need, I've got a ‘justice dispenser’ right here.
openingLines.KismetCharacter: I make my own luck. um, with [i]this[/i] handy dandy little tool!
openingLines.SpiteCharacter: this scanner seems to know you well enough already, Jack.
openingLines.ErmineTeamCharacter: oh no! what if it blows up in your face?
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: oh, [i]that's[/i] what this ‘reality solidifier’ is for!
openingLines.PlagueRatTeamCharacter: rat spray, rat spray, I know I've got some somewhere...
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: we'll see about that. now let's see, time manipulation, what have we got...?

promoCards.title: Umbra
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Play one of them and put the rest in your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: Discard the top 3 cards of 1 deck.
Select a target. Increase the next damage dealt to that target by 1 and reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 1.
Destroy up to two ongoing cards. Only one may be a villain card.

openingLines.default: I am shadow. even light just ends up making more shadow. too bad for you.
openingLines.KismetCharacter: lucky? unlucky? both fade within darkness.
openingLines.SpiteCharacter: good idea. the better to envelop you with darkness.
openingLines.ErmineTeamCharacter: do I look like I have... ‘stuff’?
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: and you face a darkness that does. not. care.
openingLines.PlagueRatTeamCharacter: release him then. oblivion awaits us all.
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: Struggle is unnecessary. I am shadow.
